content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, good to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am trying to get the highest possible price for my apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the average market price for similar apartments in the city center, I would offer 750 euros per month. However, I am willing to negotiate to get the best possible price for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Max. 750 euros per month is a reasonable offer. However, I am trying to get the highest possible price for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
